fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ask a yes-or-no question during the night. You will learn the answer.
- Smite someone at night, killing them. 2 uses.
- Publicly reveal the contents of a whisper during the day. (5 uses per day)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- You may choose to make your second ability **conditional.** This means you may say "if the answer to tonight's question is [yes/no] then I will smite [X]." You may set different conditions for both an affirmative and negative answer.
- If you kill a Townie, you become a (1596) Priest to Higher Powers.
- You may not be modkilled and effects that use the host to negatively affect you don't work. Additionally, the host must make a collage signifying your (the player's) glory and post it in your private channel before the game starts. You may share this collage at any time.
